title: Magnetism - Force on a moving charged particle

content.description: A particle with charge <math alttext="negative 2 e" overflow="scroll"><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>e</mi></math> travels to the right with a speed of <math alttext="3.0 times 10 cubed, meters per second" overflow="scroll"> <mn>3.0</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mn>10</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msup> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>m</mtext> <mo>/</mo> <mtext>s</mtext> </math> when it enters a region with a uniform magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="1.5 teslas" overflow="scroll"><mn>1.5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext></math> directed towards the bottom of the page, as shown.
